name: Mark CURRY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of August, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
